game.name: Traveler Stories: Journeys of Real People
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A fourth-year university student who hasn’t found what they truly want to do starts working part-time at a bar where travelers from around the world gather. Through conversations with unique and passionate travelers, the protagonist begins to discover their own path in life.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fourth-year university student who hasn’t found what they truly want to do starts working part-time at a bar where travelers from around the world gather. Through conversations with unique and passionate travelers, the protagonist begins to discover their own path in life.
